SELECT US.RESOURCES_ID, US.BRAND, US.MODEL, US.PRICE, US.LAST_PRICE, US.MATERIAL, US.ADDRESS, US.FREIGHT, US.SUBORDINATE_AREA FROM lot_resources US WHERE 1=1 and US.yn_flag = 'Y'
and US.SUBORDINATE_AREA like concat('%',#{address},'%')
and US.BRAND like concat('%',#{brand},'%')
order by US.orders asc

SELECT US.RESOURCES_ID, US.BRAND, US.MODEL, US.PRICE, US.LAST_PRICE, US.MATERIAL, US.ADDRESS, US.FREIGHT FROM lot_resources US WHERE 1=1 and US.yn_flag = 'Y'
and (US.BRAND like concat('%',#{searchField},'%') or US.MATERIAL like concat('%',#{searchField},'%'))

SELECT US.RESOURCES_ID, US.BRAND, US.MODEL, US.PRICE, US.LAST_PRICE, US.MATERIAL, US.ADDRESS, US.FREIGHT, US.YN_FLAG, US.CREATED_TIME, US.MODIFIED_TIME FROM lot_resources US WHERE US.YN_FLAG = 'Y'
and US.BRAND like concat('%',#{brand},'%')
and US.ADDRESS like concat('%',#{address},'%')
and US.MATERIAL like concat('%',#{material},'%')
and US.MODEL like concat('%',#{model},'%')
